documents.title: Available documentation
documents.description: The tender pack contains all documents you need for tenders and preselections. After your request, you will receive:

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.subtitle: Building a sustainable future
sustainability.description: We take our environmental responsibility seriously. With the CO₂ Performance Ladder level 3 certificate, we demonstrate our commitment to sustainable construction.

hero.badge: CO₂ Performance Ladder Level 3 · Valid until 2028
hero.label: Sustainability & CO₂
hero.title: CO₂-conscious construction
hero.description: We are certified at level 3 of the CO₂ Performance Ladder. This means concrete CO₂ reduction and transparent reporting.

whatIs.title: What is the CO₂ Performance Ladder?
whatIs.description: The CO₂ Performance Ladder is an instrument that helps companies reduce their CO₂ emissions. The certificate is increasingly required in tenders and offers award advantages. Level 3 means we know our CO₂ footprint, actively reduce it and communicate transparently about it.

insight.title: Insight
insight.description: Annual CO₂ footprint calculation according to ISO 14064-1. We measure to improve.

reduction.title: Reduction
reduction.description: Concrete measures to structurally reduce our emissions at the office and on site.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Public communication about our progress and objectives.

participation.title: Participation
participation.description: Active participation in sector initiatives and knowledge sharing with chain partners.

measures.label: Concrete Measures
measures.title: How we reduce CO₂
measures.description: Our CO₂ reduction is not a paper exercise. We implement concrete measures at the office, in our fleet and on every site.

transport.title: Sustainable Transport
transport.description: Optimization of transport routes and deployment of Euro 6 vehicles for lower emissions.

machines.title: Efficient Machines
machines.description: Investment in modern, energy-efficient machines and tools on site.

circular.title: Circular Construction
circular.description: Maximum reuse of materials and separated waste processing on every site.

energy.title: Green Energy
energy.description: Solar panels on our building and switch to green energy suppliers.

benefits.label: Benefits for You
benefits.title: What does this mean for your project?
benefits.description: More and more contracting authorities — including Infrabel, Aquafin and large municipalities — apply CO₂ criteria in their award. By working with De Raedt, you benefit from our certificate.
items: Award advantage in tenders with CO₂ criteria
Lower environmental impact of your construction project

infrabel.title: Infrabel / Tucrail
infrabel.description: Implements CO₂ Performance Ladder in procurement from September 2025

municipalities.title: Large cities & municipalities
municipalities.description: More and more local authorities apply CO₂ criteria in tenders

discount.title: Fictitious discount
discount.description: CO₂ certificate can lead to award advantage via fictitious discount on tender price

cta.title: Sustainable construction starts here
cta.description: Want to know more about our CO₂ approach or how our certificate can support your tender? Contact us.

hero.description: {years} years of craftsmanship. From monumental heritage renovation to innovative new construction — Class 6 certified for projects without limits.

section.title: Comprehensive Building
section.description: From foundation to roofing — a complete service package for your construction project, supported by {years} years of expertise.

bouwwerken.title: General Construction

01.title: Intake

cta.title: Ready to
cta.description: Plan your project with our free project planner. Within 48 hours you'll receive a no-obligation quote from our team.

hero.title: General Construction
hero.subtitle: From foundation to turnkey. Class 6 certified for the most complex government contracts and commercial buildings.

twoColumn.label: Our Expertise
twoColumn.title: Complete construction solutions for every project
twoColumn.paragraph1: As a Class 6 certified contractor, we realize construction projects of any size. From public buildings to commercial properties, we deliver tailored quality.
twoColumn.paragraph2: With {years} years of experience and a team of more than 40 professionals, we guarantee professional execution of your project.

process.title: From plan to delivery
process.subtitle: A transparent process with clear communication. You always know where you stand.

01.title: Introduction & Analysis
01.description: Thorough inventory of your wishes, budget and planning. Technical feasibility analysis.

02.title: Quote & Planning
02.description: Detailed price quote with transparent cost structure. Realistic planning with milestones.

03.title: Execution
03.description: Professional execution by our own craftsmen. Weekly progress reporting.

04.title: Delivery & Aftercare
04.description: Thorough delivery with quality control. Warranty and maintenance advice.

cta.title: Ready to build?
cta.subtitle: Contact us for a no-obligation quote. You'll hear from us within 48 hours.

hero.title: Roofing Works
hero.subtitle: Pitched and flat roofs, insulation and waterproofing. From traditional slate to modern EPDM systems.

twoColumn.label: Roof & Facade Specialist
twoColumn.title: Experts in all types of roofs
twoColumn.paragraph1: From traditional natural slate to modern Sarking insulation. Including copper cladding, zinc work and fall protection in compliance with the strictest safety standards.
twoColumn.paragraph2: With {years} years of experience and VCA** certification, we guarantee safe and quality roofing work.

hellendeDaken.title: Pitched Roofs
hellendeDaken.description: Tiles, slate, zinc and copper. Traditional craftsmanship with modern techniques.

platteDaken.title: Flat Roofs
platteDaken.description: EPDM, bitumen and green roofs. Waterproof solutions with long lifespan.

dakisolatie.title: Roof Insulation
dakisolatie.description: Sarking insulation and energy renovation. Improve your EPC score.

valbeveiliging.title: Fall Protection
valbeveiliging.description: Safe workplaces on roofs. Compliant with all standards and regulations.

cta.title: Need a new roof?
cta.subtitle: From roof inspection to complete renovation. We are happy to advise you on the best solution for your situation.

hero.title: Heritage Renovation
hero.subtitle: Restoration of protected architectural heritage with authentic techniques. Craftsmanship that transcends generations.

twoColumn.label: Monument Restoration
twoColumn.title: Authentic craftsmanship for historical heritage
twoColumn.paragraph1: Specialized restoration of protected architectural heritage. With authentic materials, traditional techniques and in close collaboration with Heritage Agency.
twoColumn.paragraph2: With {years} years of experience and ISO 9001 certification, we guarantee the highest quality standards for heritage projects.

monumenten.title: Monument Restoration
monumenten.description: Complete restoration of protected monuments with respect for historical character.

dak.title: Roof Restoration
dak.description: Authentic materials and techniques for historic roofs. Slate, copper and zinc.

gevel.title: Facade Restoration
gevel.description: Restoration of historic masonry, pointing and ornaments.

references.description: We work on the most prestigious heritage projects in Belgium. From historic town halls to university campuses.

cta.title: Heritage project?
cta.subtitle: Contact us for a no-obligation consultation. We are happy to come on-site for an initial assessment.

hero.title: Maintenance & Interventions
hero.subtitle: Framework contracts, preventive maintenance and fast interventions. We take care of everything with our technical management.

twoColumn.label: Facility Management

twoColumn.paragraph1: Long-term framework contracts for roof maintenance, repairs and renovation works. Active contracts with City of Ghent, City of Brussels, VEB and KU Leuven.
twoColumn.paragraph2: With 4 active framework contracts and 24/7 intervention service, we are ready when you need us.

raamcontracten.title: Framework Contracts
raamcontracten.description: Long-term agreements with governments and institutions for structural maintenance and renovation.
features: Active contracts with City of Ghent, Brussels

dakonderhoud.title: Roof Maintenance
dakonderhoud.description: Periodic inspections and repairs of roofs. Preventive maintenance prevents major damage.

interventies.title: Interventions
interventies.description: Fast repairs for damage or urgent problems. We are ready when you need us.

renovatiewerken.title: Renovation Works
renovatiewerken.description: Structural improvements and energy upgrades for a more sustainable building stock.

hero.description: Since {year}, De Raedt has been building Belgium's future. Craftsmanship, innovation and dedication — generation after generation.

mission.description: We don't just build buildings — we build Belgium's future. With respect for heritage, an eye for innovation and an unwavering dedication to quality. For {years} years.

story.title: Building Belgium for {years} years
story.paragraph1: What started as a small family business in Zele has grown into a renowned construction company with more than {employees} employees.
story.paragraph2: Since 1930, we have combined traditional craftsmanship with modern construction techniques. Our specialization in heritage renovation makes us the partner of choice for the restoration of historic buildings and monuments.
story.paragraph3: With Class 6 recognition, we are qualified for the most complex government contracts. Our ISO 9001 and VCA** certifications guarantee quality and safety on every site.

1930.title: Roots
1930.description: Family business active since 1930 in the construction sector in Zele

2024.title: Certification
2024.description: ISO 9001 achieved and VCA** certificate renewed after successful audit

2025.title: Sustainability
2025.description: CO₂ Performance Ladder level 3 certified by Vinçotte

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy Policy of Bouwwerken De Raedt Ivan NV

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.intro: {company}, located at {address}, is responsible for the processing of personal data as described in this privacy statement.

dataCollection.title: 2. What data do we collect?
dataCollection.intro: We process the following categories of personal data:

contact.label: Contact details:
contact.description: name, email address, phone number, address

purposes.title: 3. Processing purposes
purposes.intro: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
items: Responding to your questions and requests

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal basis
legalBasis.intro: The processing of your personal data is based on one of the following legal grounds:

retention.title: 5. Retention period
retention.intro: We do not retain your personal data longer than strictly necessary to achieve the purposes for which your data is collected. Our retention periods are:
items: Job applications: 1 year after completion of procedure
Customer portal data: duration of collaboration + 7 years

rights.title: 6. Your rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.label: Right of access:
access.description: You have the right to view your personal data.

rectification.label: Right to rectification:
rectification.description: You have the right to have incorrect data corrected.

erasure.label: Right to erasure:
erasure.description: You have the right to have your data deleted.

restriction.label: Right to restriction:
restriction.description: You have the right to restrict processing.

portability.label: Right to data portability:
portability.description: You have the right to transfer your data.

objection.label: Right to object:
objection.description: You have the right to object to processing.

rights.contact: To exercise your rights, you can contact us at {email}.

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against loss, unauthorized access, and other forms of unlawful processing.

thirdParties.title: 8. Sharing with third parties
thirdParties.content: We only share your personal data with third parties if this is necessary for the performance of our services or to comply with a legal obligation. With companies that process your data on our behalf, we conclude a processing agreement.

complaints.title: 9. Complaints
complaints.intro: If you have a complaint about the processing of your personal data, you can contact us. You also have the right to file a complaint with the Belgian Data Protection Authority (GBA):

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Changes will be published on this page.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Cookie Policy of Bouwwerken De Raedt Ivan NV

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us make the website function properly and remember your preferences.

necessary.title: 1. Necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function. Without these cookies, certain parts of the website cannot work.

analytics.title: 2. Analytical cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website. We use Plausible Analytics, a privacy-friendly alternative that does not collect personal data.

plausible.purpose: Plausible works without cookies and respects your privacy

choices.title: Your choices
choices.description: On your first visit to our website, you can choose which cookies to accept. You can change this choice at any time by deleting the cookies in your browser.
choices.gbaNote: In accordance with the Belgian Data Protection Authority (GBA), we offer you an equivalent choice between accepting and refusing non-essential cookies.

browserManagement.title: Managing cookies in your browser
browserManagement.description: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings. Here are instructions for the most commonly used browsers:

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have questions about our cookie policy? Contact us:

partnerIntake.subtitle: Upload your documents
partnerIntake.description: Upload the requested documents here to complete your partnership.

upload.dropzone: Drag files here or click to upload

success.title: Thank you!
success.message: Your documents have been received. We'll contact you after verification.

notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

metadata.siteDescription: For {years} years, your trusted partner for new construction, renovation and heritage renovation in Belgium. Class 6 certified contractor with ISO 9001, VCA** and CO₂ Performance Ladder level 3 certification.
metadata.keywords: construction company, contractor, renovation, new construction, heritage renovation, Belgium, East Flanders, Zele, De Raedt
